Reviews.Title: “Best customer service in the UAE”
Reviews.Author: mr_watson79
Reviews.Content: ive lived uae 2006 living service apartments 6 months 2010 beginning 2011 initially chose serviced apartments due competitive rate charged realistically charging half equipped clean serviced everyday fail kitchens equipped washing machine cooker fridgefreezer microwave plenty cupboard space lived uae pleasantly surprised excellent customer service ive experienced compared 5 star hotels staff genuinely pleased help negative lack swimming pool hey cant gym ample free car parking
